analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x19c135df5e637dac0a8cd68237fb1facd2d49ae4.sol:
	Contract GXAUToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x19c135df5e637dac0a8cd68237fb1facd2d49ae4.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x19c135df5e637dac0a8cd68237fb1facd2d49ae4.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.22<0.6.0 (/unique_contracts/0x19c135df5e637dac0a8cd68237fb1facd2d49ae4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x19c135df5e637dac0a8cd68237fb1facd2d49ae4.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
